alert.note: Alert for Central Greenville; Northern Spartanburg; Southern Greenville; Southern Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 6:17PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Greenville and west central Spartanburg Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 617 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Greenville Downtown, or near GSP Airport, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greer, Five Forks, Duncan, Lyman, Wellford, Reidville, Moore, GSP Airport, Mauldin and Taylors. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Greenville; Northern Spartanburg; Southern Greenville; Southern Spartanburg
